author: _shemnon
content: Something like trueblocks or another analytic node is what you would need.  https://github.com/TrueBlocks/trueblocks-core

author: definitelynotcharles7176
content:
For example, let's say I have an app that extracts meaning from conversations, online or otherwise (signed up to GPT-3 early access to prototype and build own models on GPUs). 

I have an implementation that runs end to end, but I need help on the other "appy" parts, like front end, user accounts, devops, and the other technical elements to make it into a real business.

It's not 2015, so I can't just add the word "token" and have everyone join to get magical sky money.

author: franzihei
content:
Hey all! The Solidity team is hosting an AMA tomorrow, if you have questions about...
- Solidity 0.8.x versions
- the SMTChecker
- certain features
- future plans for the language
- or something else
Then please add them to the AMA thread, we'll respond to all questions tomorrow!
